text: The 11th Orgburo of the Russian Communist Party (Bolsheviks) was elected by the 1st Plenary Session of the 11th Central Committee, in the immediate aftermath of the 11th Congress. ==Full members== {|class="wikitable plainrowheaders sortable" style="text-align:center;" border="1" ! scope="col" |Name (birth–death) ! scope="col" | Took office ! scope="col" | Left office ! scope="col" | Duration |- ! scope="row" | (1895–1971) | 3 April 1922 | 26 April 1923 | |- ! scope="row" | (1877–1926) | 3 April 1922 | 26 April 1923 | |- ! scope="row" | (1888–1935) | 3 April 1922 | 26 April 1923 | |- ! scope="row" | (1890–1986) | 3 April 1922 | 26 April 1923 | |- ! scope="row" | (1881–1938) | 3 April 1922 | 26 April 1923 | |- ! scope="row" | (1878–1953) | 3 April 1922 | 26 April 1923 | |- ! scope="row" | (1880–1936) | 3 April 1922 | 26 April 1923 | |} ==Candidate members== {|class="wikitable plainrowheaders sortable" style="text-align:center;" border="1" ! scope="col" |Name (birth–death) ! scope="col" | Took office ! scope="col" | Left office ! scope="col" | Duration |- ! scope="row" | (1875–1946) | 3 April 1922 | 26 April 1923 | |- ! scope="row" | (1873–1959) | 3 April 1922 | 26 April 1923 | |- ! scope="row" | (1890–1938) | 3 April 1922 | 26 April 1923 | |} ==References== Category:Members of the Orgburo of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of the Soviet Union
title: 11th Orgburo of the Russian Communist Party (Bolsheviks)
